meanings.sent1: Her initiation into painting started with a single brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: The initiation of the project marked the beginning of a new era.
meanings.sent3: The initiation of the race was delayed due to unexpected rain.
meanings.sent4: The initiation of the journey felt like stepping into a new world.
meanings.sent5: The initiation of the song captured everyone's attention instantly.

meanings.definition: The process of admitting someone into a group or organization through a ritual.
meanings.sent1: His initiation into the club involved a secret ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The initiation of new members was a solemn event for the organization.
meanings.sent3: The initiation of the new employee included a funny initiation dance.
meanings.sent4: The initiation of the pledge class united them as a cohesive group.
meanings.sent5: The initiation of the team member brought a sense of belonging to the group.

meanings.definition: The act of introducing someone to a new activity or skill.
meanings.sent1: Her initiation into soccer opened up a whole new world of sports.
meanings.sent2: The initiation of the students into coding was met with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The initiation of the chef into baking led to delicious creations.
meanings.sent4: The initiation of the child into reading sparked a love for books.
meanings.sent5: The initiation of the team into teamwork skills improved their collaboration.
